summary: Experienced software engineer with 5+ years of expertise in full-stack development, specializing in React, Node.js, and cloud technologies. Proven track record of delivering scalable web applications and leading development teams. Passionate about clean code, user experience, and continuous learning.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
description: Lead development of enterprise web applications using React, Node.js, and AWS
achievements: • Led a team of 6 developers to deliver a customer portal that increased user engagement by 40%
• Implemented microservices architecture that improved system performance by 60%
• Reduced deployment time from 2 hours to 15 minutes through CI/CD pipeline optimization
• Mentored 3 junior developers and conducted code reviews for team best practices

experience.title: Full Stack Developer
description: Developed and maintained web applications using modern JavaScript frameworks
achievements: • Built responsive web applications using React, TypeScript, and Node.js
• Integrated third-party APIs and payment systems (Stripe, PayPal)
• Implemented automated testing with Jest and Cypress, achieving 90% code coverage
• Collaborated with design team to implement pixel-perfect UI/UX designs

experience.title: Junior Developer
description: Contributed to web development projects and learned industry best practices
achievements: • Developed frontend components using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
• Assisted in database design and SQL query optimization
• Participated in agile development processes and sprint planning
• Gained experience with Git version control and collaborative development

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science

projects.name: E-Commerce Platform
projects.description: Full-stack e-commerce application with real-time inventory management, payment processing, and admin dashboard. Built with React, Node.js, and MongoDB.
achievements: • Handled 1000+ concurrent users during peak shopping periods
• Integrated multiple payment gateways with 99.9% uptime
• Implemented real-time inventory tracking and notifications

projects.name: Task Management App
projects.description: Collaborative project management tool with real-time updates, file sharing, and team communication features. Features include drag-and-drop task management and progress tracking.
achievements: • Improved team productivity by 25% through streamlined task management
• Built intuitive drag-and-drop interface for task organization
• Implemented real-time collaboration features with conflict resolution

projects.name: Weather Dashboard
projects.description: Interactive weather application that displays current conditions, forecasts, and historical data visualization. Includes location-based weather alerts and customizable widgets.
achievements: • Created responsive design that works seamlessly on all devices
• Implemented offline functionality with service workers
• Built interactive data visualizations for weather trends
